tagline: Homework help and concept explanation that builds understanding, not dependency
pros: Multi-subject fluency across math, science, writing, and more
Diagnoses root cause of confusion, not just symptoms
Adapts explanation style to the individual learner
Creates targeted practice at the right difficulty
cons: Won't do assignments for you — teaching only
Generalist breadth means specialist subjects may need handoff
Needs learner engagement to be effective — can't teach passively

model_recommendations.notes: Template-following, scheduling, tracking, simple Q&A. Lightweight models save cost without sacrificing quality for these structured tasks.
